content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements a lightweight fashionable beach crochet cover up is a must have summer essential crochet your own crochet beach cover up and show off your personal style at the beach or poolside this summer **size inclusive** kid sizes toddler child small child large - fits chest sizes 21 -23 24 -25 26 -28 adult sizes xs/s/m l/xl/2xl 3xl/4xl/5xl - fits chest sizes 28 -38 40 -50 52 -62 **yarn** lion brand collection cotton bamboo linen 2 is a craft yarn council #2 sport weight yarn comprised of cotton bamboo and linen as you may have guessed by the name the combination of these three natural fibers give this yarn a unique softness beautiful drape and durability ** purchase the crochet swim cover up kit here aff 3 ** lion brand has a full kit of the summer lovin swim cover up available on their website the kit includes your choice of colors and a digital copy of the pattern **construction** first you ll create two identical rectangular panels these two panels are then seamed together leaving a neck opening you ll then add a simple edging around the perimeter crochet simple ties and use the ties to partially lace the sides this paid pdf includes includes all written instructions ad-free
